snippet: Romanian prosecutors charged the deputy prime minister and 74 local officials with falsifying voter data in a referendum that failed to unseat President Traian Basescu.
abstract: Romanian prosecutors charge Liviu Dragnea, deputy prime minister, and 74 local officials with falsifying voter data in a referendum that failed to unseat Pres Traian Basescu; most of those who voted in the national referendum chose to impeach Basescu, but the vote was declared invalid because less than half the electorate took part.
lead_paragraph: Romanian prosecutors charged the deputy prime minister and 74 local officials with falsifying voter data in a referendum that failed to unseat President Traian Basescu.
